ComicInfo.Title: December 16th; How To Be A World Famous Author; Give It A Shot; Naughty Or Nice
ComicInfo.Summary: Schroeder could not be more excited. It is the most important day of the whole year...Decemeber 16th! Beethoven's birthday! Unfortunately, no one but Schroeder seems to have remembered. Enjoy this twist on the birthday spirit along with a wonderful series of new and classic Peanuts stories.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:43:30. [CVDB438074]
ComicInfo.Writer: Alexis E. Fajardo, Caleb Monroe, Charles M. Schulz, Jeff Dyer, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charles M. Schulz, Robert Pope, Scott Jeralds, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Inker: Charles M. Schulz, Justin Thompson, Paige Braddock, Robert Pope
ComicInfo.Colorist: Art Roche, Donna Almendrala, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alexis E. Fajardo, Matt Gagnon, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Linus van Pelt, Pig-Pen, Sally Brown, Schroeder, Snoopy
